about_the_game:
In Jordi & Oslo and the Lost Tail, Oslo the Dragon has gone missing. You impersonate two characters, Jordi and Sígrid, as they try to piece together who is behind their friend’s mysterious disappearance. In this humorous point-and-click adventure, you solve smart puzzles, crack punch lines, and explore beautiful watercolour-painted locations inspired by the Spanish countryside.

Get priority-mailed out of your home, beat an indefense wooden log, and discover off-limit underground facilities. Then, find your way out to a charming rural village full of quirky characters, lovely animals, and obsolete technology. Cozy banter, hot chocolate, and fussball challenges await you!

Jordi and Oslo and the lost tail is a 5x game:


Exchange items between Jordi and Sígrid’s inventories, explore lovely homely locations, explode untidy rooms, examine clues until the characters say something funny,  and expose a shady plan to gain magical powers.

A comic blend:


The video game is based on the ‘Jordi and Oslo’ comic strips that feature in the Spanish local newspaper, Segre, and it is entirely hand-drawn and hand-animated by their author, JoveGuille. The videogame mixes the whimsical 1990s point-and-click adventures style with the playful art and the dialogue style of the comic strips.
